title: Recycling Pixel 2
content:
n anyone here an explain how to recycle pixel 2 that is no longer working? its already torn apart but is still made by google, right? I was buy this in not working condition hoping to be able to repair it but turnout the problem is quite severe.

Im trying to give the retired device back to the maker to be recycled properly.

Im living in Indonesia btw. Here some photo
